name: NewYorker
text: The year 2020 in America is defined by images of crowds: people waiting in mile-long lines at food banks; more than 10,000 people gathered in Brooklyn in support of black trans rights; President Trump onstage at a less than crowded arena in Tulsa. https://t.co/4vGYmS01Y7

name: NewYorker
text: “This is what we trained to do,” one intensive-care nurse in New York City said. “This is what we do. That was true a year ago, and it will be true a year from now.” https://t.co/5BJRdZcxMo
